title: Short-Term Course for Strengthening Graphic Engineering Practical Competencies Based on PBL

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Project-based learning for professionals conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain a graphic problem-solving process based on real-world scenarios in three stages: analysis, design, and implementation.
Learners can visualize geometric models with over 90% accuracy using mobile tools, even in resource-constrained technical environments.
Learners can identify and propose improvements for at least three practical issues that may arise during graphic solution design in team-based PBL projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
